fields_of_interest: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations
head_office_address: Suite 407, China Works 100 Black Prince Road
eu_initiatives: The work of the European External Action Service and the European Commission relating to external relations and defence, as well as the EU's policies in its Eastern Neighbourhood.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
The ELN runs a European Defence programme which focuses on the future of European security, in the frameworks of the EU’s Common Security and Defence Policy (CSDP) and the NATO European pillar. It addresses the opportunities for enhancing EU-NATO relations, encouraging greater commitment to transatlantic burdensharing and improving European cohesion on security matters.  
 
https://www.europeanleadershipnetwork.org/programmes/european-defence/
goals__remit: To advance education in, and to promote greater understanding of political, security, defence, economic and energy challenges in greater Europe, and related issues, in particular multilateral nuclear disarmament, non-proliferation and nuclear security, by producing and disseminating independent research and analysis on such issues, and providing an independent platform for international dialogue and debate on such issues.
